medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in the morning and have worsened throughout the day; pain began in the unspecified region and is more localized in the lower quadrants. Denies fevers or chills, mild anorexia without nausea or vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: craniopharyngioma s/p resection, photon therapy several years ago on chronic prednisone therapy
